Title: Nautilus
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Dan Dietz, Melissa Scrivner-Love, Dan Dietz (story), Lucas O'Connor (story)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Harold reluctantly agrees to help John protect a young woman who is participating in a dangerous and deadly game, meanwhile Shaw works with a group of thieves as her new cover identity.
